prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a small dragon with a hauntingly playful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek, serpentine body and vibrant green and red colors.
Show me a small, aquatic Pokemon with unique wing-like structures and mysterious features.
Design a Pokemon that blends elements of a dragon and a ghost with a whimsical design.
Generate a tiny, playful Pokemon that has a dragon-like appearance with bright yellow eyes.
Make a ghostly creature that hovers gracefully, combining both elegance and a ghostly charm.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that can be found near caves and has an ethereal look.
